column2: Cyberonics device improves heart function after Boston flop BARCELONA
column3: Sept 1 A nerve stimulation device from Cyberonics improved cardiac function in heart failure patients in a small clinical trial
column4: in contrast to an unsuccessful study backed by Boston Scientific.

column4: the lead banks said on Monday.
